com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.localdevice.ble

类 AylaBLEDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaDevice
      • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.localdevice.AylaLocalDevice
        • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.localdevice.ble.AylaBLEDevice
  • 直接已知子类:
    AylaBLEDemoBoard, AylaBLESetupDevice

    public class AylaBLEDevice
extends AylaLocalDevice
    An AylaBLEDevice represents an AylaLocalDevice that is communicated with via Bluetooth LE. AylaBLEDevices expect the BLE device to support the Ayla GATT Service, which is structured to provide information relevant to the Ayla service. This class may be used as-is with devices that support the Ayla GATT service.

        Default constructor. It is required for derived classes to override this and call super(), otherwise devices created will not be properly initialized and will fail to function properly.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initializeBluetooth

        public void initializeBluetooth()

      • requiresLocalConfiguration

        public boolean requiresLocalConfiguration()
        从类复制的说明: AylaLocalDevice
        Indicates whether or not this device requires additional local configuration. This might be Bluetooth pairing, mobile device authentication with the IoT device, etc. Devices that require local configuration should return true from this method until the local configuration steps have been completed.
        覆盖:
        requiresLocalConfiguration 在类中 AylaLocalDevice
        返回:
        false if no additional local configuration is requried, true if local configuration is required to interact with the local device

      • mapBluetoothAddress

        public void mapBluetoothAddress(java.lang.String bluetoothAddress)
        When the actual Bluetooth address for this device has been discovered, the application should call this method to store the mapping. This will ensure that in future runs of the application the bluetooth mappings will be available without requiring a scan. Passing null for the bluetoothAddress will remove any previous mapping for this device.
        参数:
        bluetoothAddress - The BD_ADDR for this device

      • getBluetoothAddress

        public java.lang.String getBluetoothAddress()
        Returns the Bluetooth address (BD_ADDR) of this device, or null if not known
        返回:
        the Bluetooth address of this device, or null

      • isConnectedLocal

        public boolean isConnectedLocal()
        从类复制的说明: AylaLocalDevice
        Returns true if the mobile device is connected to the IoT device using the local connection protocol (e.g. Bluetooth, etc.)
        覆盖:
        isConnectedLocal 在类中 AylaLocalDevice
        返回:
        true if the device is currently connected, false otherwise

      • connectLocal

        public AylaAPIRequest connectLocal(com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                   ErrorListener errorListener)
        从类复制的说明: AylaLocalDevice
        Connects to the device locally. If the device cannot be reached, the errorListener will be called with a PreconditionError. Otherwise, the successListener will be called with an EmptyResponse indicating that the connection has been made.
        覆盖:
        connectLocal 在类中 AylaLocalDevice
        参数:
        successListener - Listener called when the connection is complete
        errorListener - Listener called with an error should one occur
        返回:
        an AylaAPIRequest, which may be used to cancel the operation

      • disconnectLocal

                                      ErrorListener errorListener)
        从类复制的说明: AylaLocalDevice
        Disconnects the local connection to the device.
        覆盖:
        disconnectLocal 在类中 AylaLocalDevice
        参数:
        successListener - Listener to receive the response when the operation succeeds
        errorListener - Listener called if an error occurs
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest, which may be used to cancel the operation
